vsParam:
Hey, Sue.
Your weapon is special.

Uh, is it?
Hmm... Don't people in this world use guns...

Oh, this is called a gun, huh?
I've never heard of it.

Uh, not your fault!
I only saw it in some imported goods!

Ah, Silver Birch Sensei.
Imported goods... So this thing is common outside our island?

No, not really. But I heard that guns are
the most advanced and powerful weapon.

Hmm, interesting!
This is so interesting! Hehe. I'm so eager to study it!

Hmm, do you want to check out how powerful
this most advanced gun is?

I still have enough bullets. Let me just anyhow kill
a monster! And show you what Sue is capable of!

Oh oh, please!
Are you guys OK with it!?

It's settled then! [px]!
Let's find a monster as my target!

There, I found a suitable monster!
Hmm, be my target!

Uh hmm, victory!
How's that? Enchanted by my marksmanship, right?

Oh... I now have a renewed understanding of how amazing Sue is.
You are really outstanding, for someone at such a young age.

Hehe, I know, right?
That's the power of the gun and Sue!

After all, I started practicing with a gun since childhood.
I'm more confident in my marksmanship than my alchemy!

But you are an alchemist, right?
Should it be the other way round...

Ha-ha, you have a point there.
Silver Birch, you happy?

Yeah, that's great! It possesses great reference value!
I must thank you for this...

... Right.
How about I help you with gun maintenance?

It has a very complicated structure, and it must be hard for
you to do the maintenance by yourself, right? What do you think?

Wow, really!? You are right. I don't know what to do with some
sophisticated parts and it worries me!

Please help me with the maintenance if possible!
Hehehe ♪

Uh. No problem!
I'm very happy to get this chance to study a gun...

Then I'll have less work to do!
It's a win-win for both of us!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
They seem to hit it off.

Uh, indeed. Isn't that nice? If Sue could bring out her best
in battles, it will ease our burdens too.

Hmm, that's right!
We shall take Sue to battles in the future!

Sue is an alchemist, not a warrior...
Forget it. I'm wasting my time...

My gun still amazes everyone, even in a different world!
Ha ha ha ha ha!!
